author: nflaig
content:
Hey zkEVM friends, just an update from Lodestar side that we have an image `ethpandaops/lodestar:optional-proofs-77ebb45` now that can interop with Lighthouse and Prysm

We have gossip, req/resp  and beacon apis implemented, as well as new CLI flags to enable it`--activateZkvm` and few others to tweak parameters like `--chain.minProofsRequired` and `--chain.zkvmGenerationProofTypes`

only tested with a dummy prover so we are not actually validating proofs yet
